00553 
00565                 static void threadUpdate()
00566                 {
00567                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00568                         {
00569                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00570                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00571                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00572                         }
00573                 }
00574 
00575 #endif
